text: Belsky () is a rural locality (a village) in Pervomaysky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 331 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 20 km from Meleuz, 15 km from Pervomayskaya. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Belsky, Meleuzovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
